overview: Three of the most prominent Moorim masters in the West receive a dangerous offer from a rebellious general. That is to kill the Shaolin monks who support the emperor! The three masters, who were interested in the excellent martial arts of the monks, did not win over the victory and accepted the general's proposal. They met on a single wooden bridge floating on the cliff of Giryeonsan Mountain. Moorim masters and Shaolin monks, the true strength is now revealed!
title: Internal Struggle
